lyric:
[by:维弗德_Winfred]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : King Henry/Paul Klein/Sasha Sloan
[00:01.000] 作词 : King Henry/Paul Klein/Sasha Sloan
[00:15.739]One, two
[00:18.090]One, two, three
[00:20.624]
[00:40.608]Like water in the desert
[00:45.571]Impossible to find
[00:50.691]You found me when I was broken
[00:53.617]Put me back together, gave me life
[01:00.696]Like a flower in the concrete
[01:05.868]So beautiful and rare
[01:11.014]You gave me hope when I was empty
[01:13.992]Walked me through the fire, you were there
[01:21.516]You're the sun to the moon
[01:26.688]You’re my ocean, painted blue
[01:31.703]You, I'm nothing without you (Without you, without you)
[01:41.865]Like an angel in a nightmare
[01:46.802]You opened up my eyes
[01:52.236]Lookin' in all the wrong places
[01:54.796]You’re the one I needed this whole time
[02:00.151]You're the sun to the moon
[02:04.983]You’re my ocean, painted blue
[02:10.077]You, I'm nothing without you (Without you, without you)
[02:20.343]You're the light in the dark
[02:25.385]You're the arrow through my heart
[02:30.531]You, I'm nothing without you (Oh-oh)
[02:38.551]I'm nothing without you (Oh-oh)
[02:43.514]I’m nothing without you (Oh-oh)
[02:48.556]I’m nothing without you (Oh-oh)
[02:54.015]I'm nothing without you
[02:58.717]I’m nothing without you
[03:03.654]I'm nothing without you
[03:08.696]I'm nothing without you
[03:11.282]You're the air in my lungs
[03:16.454]You’re the veins to my blood
[03:20.764]Yeah, you, I'm nothing without you
[03:32.180]You're the sun to the moon
[03:36.882]You’re my ocean, painted blue
[03:42.107]You, I'm nothing without you (Without you, without you)
[03:52.007]You're the light in the dark
[03:57.310]You're the arrow through my heart
[04:02.247]You, I'm nothing without you (Oh-oh)
[04:10.058]I'm nothing without you (Oh-oh)
[04:14.890]I’m nothing without you (Oh-oh)
[04:20.141]I’m nothing without you (Oh-oh)
[04:23.171]
tlyric:
[by:维弗德_Winfred]
[00:15.739]
[00:18.090]
[00:20.624]
[00:40.608]好比荒漠中的绿洲
[00:45.571]海市蜃楼般
[00:50.691]而你找寻到我 在我支离破碎时
[00:53.617]抚慰我内心残缺 注入我生活光彩
[01:00.696]如同冰冷钢筋水泥下顽强花朵
[01:05.868]分外美丽 弥足珍贵
[01:11.014]你给予我希望 在我恍惚空虚时
[01:13.992]赴汤蹈火伴着我 熬过艰难
[01:21.516]你是赋予月球光辉的炽热恒星
[01:26.688]你是我徜徉海洋 蓝色星河
[01:31.703]没有你 我便是一无所有
[01:41.865]如同梦魇中的天使
[01:46.802]你让看清了一切
[01:52.236]瞧瞧这周遭 一片狼藉
[01:54.796]糟心时刻 你便是我所需求的一切
[02:00.151]你是赋予月球光辉的炽热恒星
[02:04.983]你是我徜徉海洋 蓝色星河
[02:10.077]失去你 我便是一无所有
[02:20.343]你是茫茫漆黑中星星灯火
[02:25.385]你便是戳中我心肝的人
[02:30.531]没有你 我便是一无所有
[02:38.551]没有你 我便是一败涂地
[02:43.514]没有你 我便是一无所有
[02:48.556]没有你 我便是一败涂地
[02:54.015]没有你 我便是一败涂地
[02:58.717]没有你 我便是一无所有
[03:03.654]没有你 我便是一败涂地
[03:08.696]没有你 我便是一无所有
[03:11.282]你是我心肺中依存的氧气
[03:16.454]你是联动我血液的静脉
[03:20.764]没有你 我便是一败涂地
[03:32.180]你是赋予月球光辉的炽热恒星
[03:36.882]你是我徜徉海洋 蓝色星河
[03:42.107]失去你 我便是一无所有
[03:52.007]你是茫茫漆黑中星星灯火
[03:57.310]你便是戳中我心肝的人
[04:02.247]没有你 我便是一无所有
[04:10.058]没有你 我便是一败涂地
[04:14.890]没有你 我便是一无所有
[04:20.141]没有你 我便是一败涂地
[04:23.171]
